headline_best_practices: Keep Vietnamese headlines 8-12 words, English 6-10 words for scannability
Lead with benefit or outcome, not features
Use specific numbers when available (15+ years, 30-50% savings)
Avoid jargon—write for decision-makers, not just technical teams
trust_bullet_guidelines: Maximum 5 bullets to avoid cognitive overload
Lead each bullet with quantifiable proof point or credential
Focus on outcomes: savings, efficiency, reliability, support
Use parallel structure within each set for rhythm
cta_selection_tips: Primary CTA: Always conversion-focused (consultation, quote, schedule)
Use action verbs in imperative mood
Vietnamese tends slightly longer/politer than English equivalents
image_alt_text_standards: Describe what's visually present, not what it symbolizes
Include relevant brand/location details for context
Avoid 'image of' or 'picture of'—just describe the content
Keep under 125 characters when possible; 150 max
For charts/data viz, describe the data trend or key insight
